name: Happy Hoarder
description:
Assume the role of a hoarder, unemployed, and living in  a rented apartment. Your goal is to make enough money to pay your weekly rent. You can generate money by sorting your heap, selling items sorted, and interacting with items. Running out of energy will bring you to the next day and every 7 days you must pay your rent. Keep your head and fullness meters at reasonable percents or else you will die.

Have fun!

RARITY STAR MEANINGS:

  • Grey - Trash Item
  • Gold - Normal Item
  • Light Green - Normal Food
  • Dark Green - Super Food
  • Red - Rare Item
